data.title: FHSAA Office Directory - Florida High School Athletic Association
data.meta_description: FHSAA Office Directory - Florida High School Athletic Association
data.text: FHSAA Office Directory To telephone the FHSAA Office, dial (352) 372-9551. Once your call is answered by the automated attendant main menu, press the extension of the individual with whom you wish to speak. Administrative Staff Cristina M. Alvarez Director of Media Relations & Marketing Responsibilities: FHSAA spokesperson; media relations; Academic Team Champion program; FHSAA Finals souvenir programs; radio broadcasts, webcasts and telecasts; Student-Athlete Advisory Committee Ph: ext. 190 Fx: (352) 244-5055 calvarez@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Harriette Peebles, ext. 170 hpeebles@fhsaa.org Dorothy W. Brunson Director of Eligibility Responsibilities: eligibility rulings and related issues; appeals of eligibility rulings and undue hardship waiver requests Ph: ext. 230 Fx: (352) 373-1528 dbrunson@fhsaa.org Michael L. Colby, C.M.A.A. Associate Director of Eligibility Responsibilities: assistance with eligibility rulings and related issues; appeals of eligibility rulings and undue hardship waiver requests; governance elections; coordinator of Handbook Revision Task Force Phone: ext. 380 Fx: (352) 244-5045 mcolby@fhsaa.org Roger Dearing Executive Director Designate (Jan. 2009) Ph: ext. 110 Fx: (352) 244-5047 rdearing@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Charlene Fugate, ext. 110 cfugate@fhsaa.org Justin K. Harrison Associate Director of Athletics Responsibilities: administrator for cross country, golf, boys soccer, boys volleyball, water polo; NFHS coaches recognition program; officials program for recognition and student officials Phone: ext. 390 Fx: (352) 244-5052 jharrison@fhsaa.org –– 1 –– Michael Herchel Network Administrator Responsibilities: iFHSAA interactive online database technical support and maintenance; network administrator; computer technician; online rules clinics Ph: 120 Fax: (352) 373-1528 mherchel@fhsaa.org Technology Asst: Gabriel DeJesus, ext. 395 gdejesus@fhsaa.org Sonny Hester Senior Associate Executive Director and Chief Administrative Officer Responsibilities: eligibility enforcement and compliance; legislative and legal affairs Ph: ext. 110 Fx: (352) 244-5046 shester@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Carolyn Matheny, ext. 340 cmatheny@fhsaa.org Paul K. McLaughlin, C.A.A. Assistant Executive Director for Educational Services Responsibilities: classification and district assignments; coaches education program; online rules presentations; online officials testing; administrator for baseball, bowling, lacrosse (boys and girls), girls soccer; athletic advisory committee elections Ph: ext. 250 Fx: (352) 244-5041 pmclaughlin@fhsaa.org Admin Asst: Carlene Flitcraft-Piliero, ext. 320 cflitcraft@fhsaa.org Gary V. Pigott Senior Director of Athletics Responsibilities: administrator for flag football, football, tennis, wrestling; district coordinator assignments; NFHS rule book orders Ph: ext. 260 Fx: (352) 244-5042 gpigott@fhsaa.org
